title: Drawing, "Rapids, Catskill Creek, New York", August 1844
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed at upper left:  1 lightish ragged and thin / 2 very dark; again, at center right:  common popular; and again, at lower left:  [crosshatching] blue sky.

Verso:  Inscribed at upper left:  Oct 1844.
description:
Recto:  Horizontal sheet with cloud studies and a common popular 
Verso:  Horizontal vignette of rapids at Catskill creek

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rapids, Catskill Creek, New York", August 1844.
August 1844. Graphite on off-white paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1393.
